summary.description:
a versatile framework to explore and integrate heterogeneous microbial communities.

a versatile approach to integrate heterogeneous datasets.

LinkHD: a versatile framework to explore and integrate heterogeneous data.

Here we present Link-HD, an approach to integrate heterogeneous datasets, as a generalization of STATIS-ACT (“Structuration des Tableaux A Trois Indices de la Statistique Analyse Conjointe de Tableaux”), a family of methods to join and compare information from multiple subspaces.

Laura Zingaretti & Yuliaxis Ramayo Caldas.

Laura M Zingaretti, Gilles Renand, Diego P Morgavi, Yuliaxis Ramayo-Caldas, Link-HD: a versatile framework to explore and integrate heterogeneous microbial communities, Bioinformatics, https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btz862
summary.name: Link-HD
